name: Colony (itch)
description:
The Colony is getting flooded!

Help the ants save their home! Use the mechanisms located in each room to drain the water. Each room corresponds to a different controller.

Colony was made for the Nordic Game Jam 2016 by:

Fran Aviles
Elisa Marchesi
Pablo Sarmiento
Martin Thomsen
Miruna Vozaru

Special thanks to Martin Barreby for the background song
